summary.span: 为派生自此类的所有验证控件提供核心实现。

span.span: Provides the core implementation for all validation controls derived from this class.

summary.span: 作为抽象类，它不能被实例化。

span.span: As an abstract class, it cannot be instantiated.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从 基类继承，因此具有一个 属性。The class inherits from the base class, and thus has a property. 如果输入无效，验证器将显示属性的值 。In the event of an invalid entry, the validator displays the value of the property. 如果未设置该属性，则验证程序将 改为显示属性的值; 这是控件中显示的文本 。If the property is not set, the validator displays the value of the property instead; this is the text that is shown in the control. 此行为与 Web 窗体验证程序保持一致。This behavior is consistent with Web Forms validators. 在 ASP.NET 移动控件中，支持验证的控件是 控件 (其 属性) 并且 控件 (其 属性) 。Of the ASP.NET mobile controls, those that support validation are the control (its property) and the control (its property). 其他控件可以通过包含特性参与验证 。Other controls can participate in validation by including a attribute. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：针对 ASP.NET Server 控件验证特定值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7) 文档。For more information, see the [How to: Validate Against a Specific Value for ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7) documentation.

span.span: Validation Controls

related.span: 验证 ASP.NET 服务器控件的特定值

span.span: Validating Against a Specific Value for ASP.NET Server Controls

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通过两种方式使用。This property is used in two ways. 首先，如果属性没有值 ，则 会在其位置使用属性的值。First, if there is no value for the property, the value of the property is used in its place. 第二种情况下，当 使用控件时，摘要将 为表示无效控件的每个验证程序使用属性的值。Second, when the control is used, the summary uses the value of the property for each validator that represents an invalid control.
